title: Homeric Hymns To the Son of Cronus 1-4
body: in the context of the analysis of a Homeric Hymn to Zeus as a prooimion to an epic about Troy (Homeric Iliad)

title: Homeric Hymns To the Son of Cronus 4
body: analysis of the circumstances in which the hymnic salutation khaire/khairete is not followed by a metabasis

title: Homeric Hymns To the Son of Cronus 23
body: analysis of the Plan of Zeus as the driving force in the newer Iliad matching HHZeus.23 (esp. line 2, telesphoros), and the same theme found in the epic Cycle and the Cypria, in the context of the analysis and comparison of the beginnings of the arkhaia Ilias and of the Homeric Iliad that has come down to us [MRBTP: complete text and verse 2]
